channel.title: Translated Air Alert UA

item.title: 🔴 15:30 Air alarm in Kyiv Investigate by further messages.
item.description: 🔴 15:30 Air alarm in Kyiv Investigate by further messages.#M_kiiv This is a warning from the official Ukrainian Air Monitoring System and may indicate a potential or imminent airstrike or other threat.
